definitions.definition: unhappy or disappointed because of something unpleasant that has happened
definitions.sensetop: upset about/at/over somethingupset about/at/over doing somethingupset (that)…upset with somebody

examples.text: I understand how upset you must be feeling.
There's no point **getting upset** about it.
He was **really upset** over not getting the present he wanted from Father Christmas.
I was upset at missing all the excitement.
She was upset that he had left without saying goodbye.
I think she may be a bit upset with you.
She was still upset about her divorce.
The incident had left him visibly angry and upset.

definitions.definition: an illness in the stomach that makes you feel sick (= want to vomit) or have diarrhoea

examples.text: I've been off work with an upset stomach.
